tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE telecardiology_data (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    diagnosis TEXT,
    encryption_key VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  diagnosis TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE consultations (
  consultation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  cardiologist_id INT,
  consultation_date TIMESTAMP,
  notes TEXT,
  CONSTRAINT fk_patient FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
  CONSTRAINT fk_cardiologist FOREIGN KEY (cardiologist_id) REFERENCES cardiologists(cardiologist_id)
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  dob DATE,
  address VARCHAR(100),
  encrypted_data BYTEA
);

CREATE TABLE medical_records (
  record_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INTEGER REFERENCES patients(id),
  doctor_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  diagnosis TEXT,
  treatment_plan TEXT,
  test_results BYTEA
);

CREATE TABLE doctors (
  doctor_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  specialization VARCHAR(50),
  hospital VARCHAR(100),
  license_info BYTEA
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
   patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   patient_name VARCHAR(50),
   date_of_birth DATE,
   medical_history TEXT,
   encryption_key VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE medical_records (
   record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   patient_id INT,
   doctor_id INT,
   record_date DATE,
   diagnosis TEXT,
   prescription TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE prescriptions (
   prescription_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   record_id INT,
   drug_name VARCHAR(50),
   dosage VARCHAR(20),
   frequency VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE encryption_logs (
   log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   date_time TIMESTAMP,
   action VARCHAR(50),
   table_affected VARCHAR(50),
   affected_rows INT
);
